page.title: 15THE VILLAGE JUNIOR SCHOOL
page.content: Churchdown Village Junior School has got about 220 pupils and is situated in Station Road in the middle of the village.There are 8 members of staff,including the Headmaster.It has a very large playing field and playground.On the field there are several rounders pitches,a cricket square and a running track which have been marked out. In the summer the girls play rounders and the boys play cricket,both do 5-Star Athletics.The winter games include football for the boys and netball for the girls.The 4th years go swimming once a week. The school has one computer and all the pupils use this.There is a school orchestra and a choir.Several pupils have music lessons at school.There is a happy atmosphere in the school.
